      • call

        public static Object call(Object receiver,
                          Method method,
                          Object[] args,
                          boolean reentrant)
                   throws Throwable
        External interface for calling a Prolog method - if a call is reentrant (e.g. because it is coming from the PJLibrary and because the context of the current Prolog call needs to be saved) a new engine is pushed onto the stack.
        Throws:
        Throwable
